title: WTB: T206 Ames (Hands At Chest), Ames (Hands Above Head), Barger, Bowerman in SGC50

posts.post_title: WTB: T206 Ames (Hands At Chest), Ames (Hands Above Head), Barger, Bowerman in SGC50
posts.post_content:
I am looking to purchase the following T206 in SGC50 or better (No PSA Please):

Red Ames (Hands At Chest)
Red Ames (Hands Above Head)
Cy Barger
Frank Bowerman

Thanks for looking!
Phil

One Month Bump!

Boy, these have been more difficult than I thought......especially the Ames'
